articles.title: Trump: Michigan trip to include Black church and far-right activists - The Associated Press
articles.description: Donald Trump is courting Black voters and a conservative group popular with white supremacists during back-to-back stops in Michigan. The former president hosted a Saturday afternoon roundtable discussion at an African American church in Detroit and delivered…
articles.content: DETROIT (AP) Donald Trump used back-to-back stops Saturday to court Black voters and a conservative group that has been accused of attracting white supremacists as the Republican presidential candida… [+7427 chars]

articles.author: HEATHER HOLLINGSWORTH
articles.title: Some hawking stem cells say they can treat almost anything. They can't - The Associated Press
articles.description: Attorneys general across the U.S. have a new fight on their hands: protecting Americans from unproven and expensive stem cell treatments that salespeople claim can cure almost anything. Iowa is among the states suing companies raking in millions by injecting …
articles.content:
The mailings promised Life Without Pain! via stem cell injections or IVs administered in a patients own home. The allure was obvious: more than 20% of U.S. adults endure chronic pain.
